Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngaphandle kwabo bakholwayo, benza izenzo zobulungisa, bafundisane ngenyaniso, bafundisane nangomonde
Ecinga	ukuba	ubutyebi	bakhe	buza	kumenza	aphile ngonaphakade
Nakanye! Uya kuphoswa koko kuqhawula (izinto) zibe zizicwibi
Yintoni na enokukuchazela okokuba yintoni na eqhawula (izinto) zibe zizicwibi
Awubonanga na ukuba iNkosi yakho Yenza njani na ngabanini ndlovu
Ayizanga Ilenze liphanze na icebo labo
